channel.title: Rock'n'Berries on Latvian songs ABC notation
channel.description: Recent content in Rock'n'Berries on Latvian songs ABC notation

item.title: Feel the Love
item.description: I’m trying to clear the shades behind us I search for way to own your trust They’re coming up, they try to divine us All of we got turn into dust Why can’t you share what you feel? What you’re feelin’? Why can’t you feel the love that i give Why can’t you share with me what you’re feelin’? What you’re feelin’? Why can’t you feel the love that i’m givin’?

item.title: Dvēselīt
item.description: Tukšumā stāvu un ceru, ka kļūs, Tukšumā stāvu un ceru, ka kļūs, Ka man kļūs vieglāk, Ka man kļūs vieglāk Bez tevis būt.. Dienas kā soļi, tie projām iet Dienas kā soļi, kas vairs nepāriet Kad man kļūs vieglāk, Kad man kļūs vieglāk, Es došos tiem līdz Dvēselīt, tavu vārdu es meklēšu rīt Starp zvaigznēm, kuras cēli spīd Dvēselīt, tavu vārdu es meklēšu rīt Starp zvaigznēm.. Sirdij un laikam jau nepavēl Ja zvaigznēs būs rakstīts, tad ļauj, lai tā kvēl Bet, ja gribas kliegt un izkliegt to sāpi, kas tevī Tad dari to tā, lai pat velns tevi sadzird Dvēselīt, tavu vārdu es meklēšu rīt Starp zvaigznēm, kuras cēli spīd Dvēselīt, tavu vārdu es meklēšu rīt Starp zvaigznēm.

item.title: Daydream
item.description: She’s like a girl from the scene I’m seein' in my dreams Shining in majesty She put her spell on me I am just a guy she've never seen Confused and lost in my daydream So fast and imperceptibly She charmed me easily She’s walking over me I’m seeking words to speak My mind plays tricks on me I can see my destiny If I’m too shy or weak Time leaves me in misery I want you to come with me I know we’re meant to be My cards are plain to see Yeah, you are my fantasy I want you to be with me Let’s unite in harmony Cause you’re livin' in my dreams Yeah, you are my ecstasy

item.title: Better days
item.description: They told me better days will come So, I’ve been waiting patiently alone Thousands of sunsets on my own Locked up in my silent groan Where are you, my better days? It has been too long I remain tame for the years to come Until you bless me, my better days How long will I whit-stand My time is slipping through the fingers like sand How long will I whit-stand I guess so long, my better days!

item.title: Down
item.description: I was lost in the river And the river was your love They say I am a criminal For steeling your taken heart But I don’t give up! Ooh, I just want to be with you, babe Even when the sun goes down I just want to be with you, darling Even when the world goes down Down, down, down... I was lost in the moonlight And the moonlight was your heart They can track me down they can shot me down But the love will stay on the spot Cause I won’t give it up!

item.title: Footsteps
item.description: Footsteps in my heart You left them walking away from me Now that we’re apart The loneliness is all I see The bridge is falling down Call your name around and around.. Around You turned your back on me A thousand times before I’m sick and hopeless laying here And praying at your door I don’t need anything But the thing I know for sure I need your love I need your cure Days are running fast Now that I’m away from you Faces come and go But yours the one I’m searching for The places I have been There’s always just an empty scene

item.title: Funky Vibes
item.description: I play my funky music tonight It makes me high it feels so right I play my funky music all night Wanna feel you dancing by my side When the lights are gone You catch my vibes and I Take your soul tonight I play my funky music tonight I wanna see you move your body right Move those legs to the left and right And let me see you freaky tonight When the lights are gone You catch my vibes and I Take your soul tonight

item.title: Addiction
item.description: Too many wise men all around me Sententious thoughts expressed out loud Confusion leads to desperation I find myself down on the ground I know you’re with me Don't let me down Why do you tease me? I need you To grab me and take me to The only place where I see through The wall of dust in front of view I can’t resist addiction To your presence by my side Love is my obsession All your wills I'll satisfy Temptation has no limits Release me and make me fly There’s no justice and no mercy No one’s there to cure your pain Human mindless fight for glory Slowly drives me insane

item.title: Ceturtdienas vakarā
item.description: Ceturtdienas vakarā Viņš iziet ielās pastaigāt Kaut arī lietus laukā līst Pa peļķēm patika tam klīst Pa padebešiem te melniem, te baltiem Dejoja kāds maziņš vīrs Tas nezināja kur likties rītdien Tāpēc tas lūdzās zibenim Iesper man, Iesper reizes trīs Iesper man, Lai es arī justos dzīvs Jaunas dienas sakumā, Tam skaļi kliedzot klusumā Kaut trakā bite ausīs dūc Tas teica lūdzu neaizmūc Pa padebešiem te melniem te baltiem Dejoja kāds maziņš vīrs Tas nezināja kur likties rītdien Un atkal lūdzās zibenim
